snippet: A crane on a barge being towed by a tugboat accidentally hit the scaffolding on the underside of the Brooklyn Bridge about 8:15 p.m. Tuesday, damaging about 20 feet of scaffolding.
abstract: A crane on a barge being towed by a tugboat accidentally hit the scaffolding on the underside of the Brooklyn Bridge about 8:15 p.m. Tuesday, damaging about 20 feet of scaffolding.

headline.main: Crane Clips Scaffolding Under Brooklyn Bridge
